Jupiter Offer Details:

Get Flat cashback of 100 using Jupiter UPI

Minimum Order value : 250

Offer is applicable on Cinepolis movies and F&B

Offer is applicable only on first transactions done using Jupiter UPI

Offer can be availed only once per user during the offer period

Offer is only applicable to Rupay CC linked or Savings account with Jupiter UPI and applicable only on the first transaction.

The offer is applicable to all first time Jupiter customers

Cashback will be credited in the form of Jupiter Jewels which can be viewed and redeemed by logging into the Jupiter app.

Jupiter Jewels can be redeemed for a wide range of products and services within the Jupiter app including Flat Cashback bill payments Digi Gold and more.

This offer is valid till 30th September 2025

For any queries or assistance related to the offer please contact: +91 8655055086

 

Terms and Conditions:

The offer is valid on transactions undertaken on the web and app of Cinepolis.

Offer is only valid for cinemas listed on Cinpolis digital channels.

Movie tickets are subject to availability at the respective Cinpolis Cinemas.

Offer applicable only on payments done with RuPay Credit Card on UPI via PhonePe app
Offer applicable only on payments made on PhonePe QR 
Cashback amount will be in the form of Scratch Cards on eligible transactions
View MyRewards section Find the unscratched card and Swipe to redeem
Applicable  twice per user per month
Offer applicable only on Cinepolis Cinemas
Offer valid for a limited time only
Terms and Conditions:

Any additional amount on top of the offer must be borne by the customer.
Offer is only valid for cinemas listed on Cinpolis digital channels.
In case of any issues please contact support@cinepolis.com
Discount is applicable only on the complete cart value of each transaction (as applicable).
This offer cannot be combined with any other ongoing offer/discount/promotion available on Cinpolis digital channels.
Movie Tickets and Food & Beverages are subject to availability at the respective Cinpolis Cinemas.
Movie Tickets and F&B once bought shall be considered sold and cannot be cancelled refunded or exchanged in any form whatsoever.
Once the Movie Tickets booking is completed the confirmation e-mail/SMS received from Cinpolis needs to be scanned/exchanged with cinema representative to enter the cinema premises.
Customer shall not be entitled to compensation/benefits in any form whatsoever in lieu of the offer being availed.
Cinpolis India reserves the right to disqualify any Customer(s) from the benefits of the Program. In case of any fraudulent activity prosecution will be carried out according to the purpose of availing the benefits under the Program.
Cinpolis India reserves the right to modify/withdraw/discontinue all or any of the terms applicable to the Offer/Program without assigning any reason or without any prior intimation whatsoever.
Cinpolis India Private Limited's general rules & regulations are applicable.
Customers are not bound in any way to participate in this program. Any such participation is voluntary and the same is being made purely on a "best-effort basis".
Cinpolis India Private Limited reserves the right at any time without prior notice to add alter modify all or any of these terms and conditions or replace wholly or in part this program by any other program whether like this program or not or to withdraw it altogether.
In addition to the above this offer is also subject to www.cinepolisindia.com general Terms of Use. Kindly refer to www.cinepolisindia.com Terms & Conditions on the homepage.

Offer valid on a a minimum transaction value of INR 600.
This offer is only applicable on Cinepolis Cinemas
Offer will be valid on every Friday Saturday and Sunday during the offer period.
Offer valid twice a user in a month on RBL Bank Credit Cards.
Offer valid till 31st December 2025
Terms and Conditions:

Any additional amount on top of the offer must be borne by the customer.
Offer is only valid for cinemas listed on Cinpolis digital channels.
In case of any issues please contact support@cinepolis.com
Discount is applicable only on the complete cart value of each transaction (as applicable).
This offer cannot be combined with any other ongoing offer/discount/promotion available on Cinpolis digital channels.
Movie Tickets and Food & Beverages are subject to availability at the respective Cinpolis Cinemas.
Movie Tickets and F&B once bought shall be considered sold and cannot be cancelled refunded or exchanged in any form whatsoever.
Once the Movie Tickets booking is completed the confirmation e-mail/SMS received from Cinpolis needs to be scanned/exchanged with cinema representative to enter the cinema premises.
Customer shall not be entitled to compensation/benefits in any form whatsoever in lieu of the offer being availed.
